html:
2.22.24  8:51 pm   how do you feel about leap years?

      good

2.22.24  8:13 pm   logically, everyone should be screaming in terror at all times, but whenever i go outside no one's ever screaming and in fact eveyone looks at me weird if i do scream. why is that?

      maybe they're just taking a break

2.22.24  8:08 pm   what is your dream

      communication

2.22.24  7:37 pm   are you usually more interested in getting to know people when they're kind or when they're mean? like, are you more intrigued by kind people or mean people? 

      too much of either one can be a red flag

2.22.24  7:11 pm   where did you learn to play music?

      at home, and in the workplace

2.22.24  6:49 pm   Somewhere in my notes app I have a list of questions I want to ask you and one of them was named "when I get older 3:4 polyrhythm" but I neglected to specify the question itself and have since forgotten. 

      fair enough

2.22.24  6:36 pm   Bill, did you know that your music goes extremely well with watching pigeons peacefully peck at the grass?

Can you please let me know if you agree? 

      this may not be what you want to hear, but, all music seems to go well with pigeons. to be more specific: all music seems to go so well with pigeons in a way that will make you feel sure that this is the exact only music that could go with these pigeons at this time. that's just the way pigeons are

2.22.24  6:35 pm   do you like lemons?

      no, but that doesn't mean they aren't good

2.22.24  5:51 pm   It's crazy seeing people getting tattoos of song lyrics or album covers. Like what happens if you stop liking that type of music or if the verse stops clicking? Though for the longest time I wanted to get the line "today i woke up" tattooed on me. Does this situation make sense?

      sure. although i don't know what it's like to go through this. i've never had any tatoos and never really talked to anyone else about their experience of it

2.22.24  5:49 pm   Do you think you could give good project suggestions to someone who doesn't make artistic projects?

     sure

     Because I often have a harder time finishing projects rathen than starting them, and maybe that's a bad thing.

     i'm not following how that relates to your question, but i can give suggestions for either case: the project starting and the project finishing, whichever case you may be in

2.22.24  5:37 pm   Weirdest thing?

      time

2.22.24  5:09 pm   Can you remember a time you listened to someone and thought something along the lines of, "holy hell, you are stupidly intelligent." If you can, who were they? Could I listen to someone like that too? 

      it happens whenever i listen to anyone

2.22.24  5:06 pm   i was asked, "if you could be anyone else, who would you pick?" and i was gonna say "bill wurtz," but then i realized, that might fulfill *my* dreams, but if i were you, i wouldn't have my dreams, i would have *your* dreams. so i'm curious, does being bill wurtz fulfill your dreams?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.22.24  5:01 pm   Do you use a sustain pedal to play the keyboard?

      yes

2.22.24  4:54 pm   on a scale from 1 to 5 how much do you think of yourself as neurotypical?

      3, where 1 is neurotypical and 5 is neurotypical

2.22.24  4:14 pm   Do you like architects?

      sure

2.22.24  4:10 pm   hey bill i thought i was afraid all the time and that was why i could do nothing but now im medicated and not afraid anymore, yet i'm ♫ still a piece of garbage ♪ how do i stop being garbage and start doing things???

      start thinking of all the things you wish you could do if you could do things. then write some of them down. this will get you closer

2.22.24  4:07 pm   have you been outside?

     yes

     when's the last time you've been outside

      moments ago

2.22.24  2:30 pm   I might have already asked this, but why is it showing the lighthouse from Fire Island, east of NYC, at the end of the "more than a dream" video?

      to test your lighthouse identification skills

2.22.24  1:38 pm   why do you think no one has invented transparent toasters yet?

      i'm certain they have, you just haven't found one

2.22.24  1:31 pm   why do we measure tv's diagonally

      the answer is simple; because the world has gone mad

2.22.24  12:55 pm   is 29 too late to learn music well enough to compose something good? 

      no

2.22.24  12:54 pm   have you ever wondered why there are so many ponds?

      no

2.22.24  12:30 pm   Do you think your brain has more or less neurons compared to the average human?

      i have no idea how to count neurons. if i did, i assure you i'd have a thriving neuron counting business by now

2.22.24  12:16 pm   bill, i'm failing at everything :// i feel like a waste of time and space.

      that sounds like the kind of feeling that inspires a person to succeed

2.22.24  12:12 pm   you said you added the "VACATIONING IN THE MIDDLE OF THE SUN" message after posting here comes the sun. why is it labeled as 1.2.20 specifically?

     it didn't really seem to fit the format of the page to label a time period spanning many months. so i had to choose a day. so i suppose i had to do it artistically, in a similar way you might choose a title for a song in a case where putting the entire contents of the song in the title would be inappropriate for the formatting of the setting in which the song title appears

      what happened that day

      i was probably doing graphics experiments

2.22.24  11:14 am   Have you ever been tarred and feathered?

     no

      Do you want to be tarred and feathered?

     no

2.22.24  11:09 am   why writing good but difficult?

     maybe you like the exciting stuff

     make it easier?

     ok i will

2.22.24  10:52 am   Do you plan on uploading new content this year?

      yes

2.22.24  10:22 am   would you ever release a vinyl with your songs on them?

     maybe

     What songs would you pick?

     all of them

     What colour would it be?

     i wouldn't design it until i actually decide to do it

     If Meet me In September isn't on it - why not?

     i can't think of any good reason

2.22.24  10:00 am   I am learning Japanese, which should be made easier by the fact that all of my favorite movies (so far) were made in Japan. But I am running into a problem, which is that the studio that made them let Disney handle the English dubs, and they made them too good in English.

      in that case you may have to take on a challenge harder than anything you've ever attempted before: watch the original language version

2.22.24  7:41 am   Was there any reason for using the dembow rhythm in the ground plane?

      sure, that is an earth beat. common and normal for usage on earth. i use it sometimes when i make music on Earth

2.22.24  4:01 am   are u doing any podcasts soon?

      i think so

2.22.24  3:55 am   Which sports do you not enjoy participating in? (Thanks!)

      sailing

2.22.24  12:24 am   What do you think of the intuitiveness of mathematical symbols? I.e + - =

      they tried

2.21.24  11:49 pm   how do people just walk into places?

      it helps if you start by imagining yourself there in your mind first

2.21.24  11:37 pm   How do I know if it's read or read?

      switch it to see/saw. if it's "see" then it sounds like "reed". if it's "saw", then it sounds like "red". if it's only in writing, try the see-saw test and see which way makes it more sense

2.21.24  11:35 pm   in the lyrics page there's occasional messages within the lyrics that you write in brackets. like for the ending you have "[riff, to continue another beautiful day as it rains all day]" i love these. do they come from while you're writing the song,  or do you come up with them and add them as needed post production?

      in that case, the melody there is an instrumental stand-in for the same part of the first verse. so that was the most convenient way of describing it, as it relates to the previous verse

2.21.24  11:16 pm   What is your favorite question you've been asked? Or would you prefer to have a new one to be your favorite?

      it's this one

2.21.24  11:06 pm   J'ai juste apprendre que tu parle un peu de français et je suis très heureux (je ne peux pas fait la /bien/ français, mais un peu, comme toi)

      ik snap het helemaal

2.21.24  10:44 pm   if you could eat any letter of the alphabet, which one would you eat

      i think you've mistaken me for someone else

2.21.24  10:34 pm   have you ever made stovetop popcorn

      no

2.21.24  10:10 pm   2.21.24  10:15 am Wouldn't 27 be a double tripling? 3x3x3... so you have 3, triple it get 9, triple it again get 27. That's two triples.

      i was expecting to hear from you. it's a "double tripling of 3", but that's not what i said. without specifying a starting root, i just said it's a "triple tripling", and so with no root specified it can be assumed that it starts from 1, which is secretly where all power-exponents start from. in case you were wondering why anything to the 0th power is actually 1

2.21.24  8:52 pm   do you own an electric guitar? 

      yes

2.21.24  8:31 pm   How do I break the cycle?

      don't worry about that, just go ahead and start a new cycle

2.21.24  8:05 pm   do you know why walls look like that?

      yes, that's so as not to distract you from the rooms

2.21.24  7:57 pm   What are the chances that someone of very high social stature  has asked you a question on this website

like maybe Anthony Gatto

      it seems likely

2.21.24  7:54 pm   what mathematical concept do you find most agreeable/ disagreeable?

      the reflexive property of equality

2.21.24  7:50 pm   Why can't we all just get along?

      maybe we're holding out for something much better than just that

2.21.24  7:21 pm   what's a song with heavily autotuned vocals that still have a lot of passion and feeling behind them

      too many to mention. pitch correction isn't really a passion hinderence per se, as you may be implying here
